model.name: CAPRI
model.description: Optional criteria grouping framework. Users can adopt this model or use any alternative.

criteria.title: Communication and Collaboration
criteria.description: Shares ideas clearly and works effectively with others.

criteria.title: Attitudes and Values
criteria.description: Demonstrates respectful, ethical, and growth-oriented behaviors.

criteria.title: Practical and Organisational Skills
criteria.description: Plans work, manages time, and executes tasks reliably.

criteria.title: Research and Critical Thinking
criteria.description: Investigates sources and evaluates ideas with sound reasoning.

criteria.title: Innovation and Creativity
criteria.description: Generates original ideas and applies creative solutions.
